title: Fool Gone Missing
description: This is the 4th novel by retired San Francisco attorney, Joe McCray. Fool continues the stories of 2 attorneys,Daniel Mermot O'Neil and Joe Cleary, born in Montana and then practicing law in San Francisco. The story begins with a prison murder, a wrongly accused attorney and continues with O'Neil and Cleary investigating and bringing down one of California's candidates for Governor in solving the crime and revealing the events that took place in San Quentin.Great tale ... wonderful read
author: Joe Mccray
